thread.title: Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury
thread.title_full: Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury

title: Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury
text:
KLTV Closed Captioning Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury 
HOUSTON (AP) - Houston running back Arian Foster has left in the second quarter against Indianapolis with an unspecified injury. 
Foster was injured after taking a hard hit with about 4 minutes left in the second quarter. He remained on the field for a couple of minutes while trainers looked at him before walking off the field. He came back in two plays later and carried the ball for no gain before going to the locker room. 
The team did not provide any details on his injury. 
It was Foster's second game this season after he missed Houston's first three games after groin surgery.
